title: Drive by shooting victims say they can't say why they were targeted
content:
ALBANY, GA (WALB) -
People who live in an Albany home targeted in a drive-by shooting Tuesday night say they don't know why they were attacked.
16 year old Artist Thomas, Junior underwent surgery Wednesday morning on his arm and is recovering.
He was on a couch inside the home in the 1500 block of Avalon Avenue around 9:15 Tuesday night.
Police say at least 7 people were in the duplex and more people were on the porch when an unknown number of gunmen fired several shots from a white Cadillac.
Folks at the home Wednesday did not want to be identified, but told us they don't know the motive for the shooting.
